snippet: BROWN--Roscoe. The Association for a Better New York mourns the loss of longstanding board member Roscoe C. Brown, Jr. Dr. Brown was an educator, a civic leader, and a member of the famed Tuskegee Airmen. He was a hero who will be missed. William ...
lead_paragraph: BROWN--Roscoe. The Association for a Better New York mourns the loss of longstanding board member Roscoe C. Brown, Jr. Dr. Brown was an educator, a civic leader, and a member of the famed Tuskegee Airmen. He was a hero who will be missed. William C. Rudin, Chairman 1/3
